nodes.text: Tindalo was a male Twi'lek who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He made his living as a merchant on board Carrick Station.

Tindalo first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a Alderaan planetary commendation vendor on board Carrick Station. He was later relabeled as the Level 29 Equipment Vendor, though he was later removed along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
